charge_type.source: The defendant pleaded guilty to one count of trafficking in dangerous drugs on 20 February 2025.

drugs.source: The particulars of the charge are that the defendant on 30 November 2023, at Room 1140, Hong Tai House, Cheung Hong Estate, Tsing Yi, New Territories, unlawfully trafficked in dangerous drugs, namely, 112.35 grammes of a solid containing 85.63 grammes of cocaine and 211.16 grammes of a solid containing 170.37 grammes of ketamine.

The particulars of the charge are that the defendant on 30 November 2023, at Room 1140, Hong Tai House, Cheung Hong Estate, Tsing Yi, New Territories, unlawfully trafficked in dangerous drugs, namely, 112.35 grammes of a solid containing 85.63 grammes of cocaine and 211.16 grammes of a solid containing 170.37 grammes of ketamine.

roles.source: I am satisfied that the role of the defendant is one of storekeeper and courier.
I am satisfied that the role of the defendant is one of storekeeper and courier.

guilty_plea.source: The defendant pleaded guilty to one count of trafficking in dangerous drugs on 20 February 2025. He was committed to the Court of First Instance for sentence. Today he confirms his plea and admission of the Summary of Facts.

starting_point.source: I find the mathematical starting point of 10 years’ imprisonment appropriate in this case.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: I find the mathematical starting point of 10 years’ imprisonment appropriate in this case.

final_sentence.source: Accordingly, the defendant is sentenced to a total of 6 years and 8 months’ imprisonment.
